p: Several species of the genus Rheum from the family Polygonaceae are commonly consumed as rhubarb. More than the purgative effects that make it a suitable detoxifying agent, rhubarb has pulmonary tonifying activity from the view of TPM. It helps the body to excrete abnormal (pathologic) phlegm and consequently, reduces the organ’s susceptibility to infections ( Aghili Khorasani, 1771; Zheng et al., 2013).
